import { MdOutlineFitScreen, MdShoppingBag, MdAddCircleOutline } from "react-icons/md" import { HiOutlineMinusCircle } from "react-icons/hi" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { decrement, increment ,addProduct} from "../../redux/cartSlice" import "./shop.css" import { useState } from "react" const Shop = () => { const count = useSelector((state) => state.cart.value) const countTotal = useSelector((state) => state.cart.totalvalue) const dispatch = useDispatch() const [state, setState] = useState(false) const openShopcart = () => { if (state == false) { document.querySelector(".shop__cart").classList.add("shop__cart-open") setState(true) } if (state == true) { document.querySelector(".shop__cart").classList.remove("shop__cart-open") setState(false) } } return (
